2004900.name: Warp Dash
2004900.description:
Welcome to Warp Dash, a high-speed 3D endless runner set in a fractured multiverse. You play as a mysterious cubicle traveler, launched from another dimension and trapped in a hostile alien world that stretches infinitely.

Every run is a new adventure â€” procedurally generated environments ensure no two dashes are the same. With tight controls, beautiful low-poly visuals, and an atmospheric soundtrack, Warp Dash delivers adrenaline-fueled gameplay with a sense of wonder and discovery.

Will you outrun the void... or become part of it?
